database-object.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `SentinelCPUStats` ( `Machine_ID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `Date` DATETIME NOT NULL, `Cpu` INT NOT NULL, `User` DECIMAL(3,3) NOT NULL, `System` DECIMAL(3,3) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Machine_ID`, `Date`, `Cpu`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `SentinelMemoryStats` ( `Machine_ID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `Date` DATETIME NOT NULL, `Free` LONG NOT NULL, `Total` LONG NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Machine_ID`, `Date`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `SentinelDiskUsageStats` ( `Machine_ID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `Date` DATETIME NOT NULL, `Disk` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `Free` LONG NOT NULL, `Total` LONG NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Machine_ID`, `Date`, `Disk`) ) Engine = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `SentinelNetworkStats` ( `Machine_ID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `Date` DATETIME NOT NULL, `Device` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `Send` LONG NOT NULL, `Receive` LONG NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Machine_ID`, `Date`, `Device`) ) Engine = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `SentinelThroughputStats` ( `Machine_ID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `Date` DATETIME NOT NULL, `Device` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `Send` FLOAT NOT NULL, `Receive` FLOAT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Machine_ID`, `Date`, `Device`) ) Engine = InnoDB;
